Workflow.Name: [Prescribed Risk Frequency Override] Update Risk Frequency
Workflow.Description: When a Prescribed Frequency Override record is updated, it updates the Risk Trigger field of the related Operation Activity Risk Scores Records. This will then trigger the [Operation Activity Risk Scores] Update Risk Rating flow to run so that the Risk Frequency is updated.

LocalizedName.description: [Prescribed Risk Frequency Override] Update Risk Frequency

Description.description: When a Prescribed Frequency Override record is updated, it updates the Risk Trigger field of the related Operation Activity Risk Scores Records. This will then trigger the [Operation Activity Risk Scores] Update Risk Rating flow to run so that the Risk Frequency is updated.
